DOC.criteria: Male athlete age 18 40 year endurance exercise less 34 hr . / week since least last 12 week . Subject leave ventricular ejection fraction le 55 % 70 % . Subjects body fat le 16 % determined skin fold assessment . Subject willing refrain vigorous physical activity 12 hr prior clinic visit . Subject nonalcoholic/ nonsmoker . Subject understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study Investigator . Left Ventricular Ejection fraction le 55 per cent echocardiogram . Subjects suffer anemia define Hb level ≤ 10 g/ dl . Subject uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mm Hg ) define average blood pressure measure screening . History coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction , hypertension diabetes mellitus . History cardiomyopathy , congenital heart defect , open heart surgery , ongoing arrhythmia .
